title: Gill Sans look alike?
content:
Hi All,

Is this just another cut of Gill? The apex of the W is sharp where the crotch is flat. Which is opposite from my cut of Gill.

Thanks in advance!

[British Airways Ad](http://web.archive.org/web/20090925175330/http:/www.britishairways.com/cms/global/assets/images/promotion/uk/sepwoffers2009/splash-lead.gif)
author: Erakez

comments.content:
If it’s BA it’s probably ’Mylius’ - their own corporate font.

Nick Cooke
Hrm, I’m quite sure its not Mylius.
The “U” too doesn’t match Gill Sans.
